posts.post_title: FS: 1910 T212 OBAK Kusel (Just Right), T206 Graham GHOST, T206 Devore AB460 SGC 50
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
Prices include first class shipping with delivery confirmation.

Looking for check or money order.

Email me at: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com

Emails have priority. First to contact me with intent to purchase gets the card(s).

Thanks for looking.

1910 T212 OBAK Kusel 175 Subjects with the very tough "Just Right" back.  Only found on 2 subjects in the set.  Final Price Reduction:  $398
[IMG]http://i84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/1910T212ObackKuselwithJustRightback.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Bill Graham (GHOST Image) SGC 20 with Piedmont 350 back.  Paper loss on the front is the reason for the grade.  $50
[IMG]http://i84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/1909-11T206GrahamBillStLouisGHOST.jpg[/IMG]

T206 Josh Devore SGC 50 with American Beauty 460 Back.  Toughest of the AB backs  $125
[IMG]http://i84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/1909-11T206DevoreJoshAB460.jpg[/IMG]

T-206 Fred Beck w/Broadleaf 350 back.  Graded SGC 10.  Nice clean back.  SOLD
[IMG]http://i84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/1909-11T206BeckFredBroadLeaf350.jpg[/IMG]
